jobDescription: Our Direct Client is in immediate need of a Data Analyst in Sacramento, CA 95827. The assignment will initially be for 20 hours per week (up to 40 depending on workload) for two months (with potential for a one month extension). Start Date would be ASAP. Basic Duties: Transferring, manipulating, and analyzing data while maintaining proper format for our records.  Analyze data for anomalies and inconsistencies  Communicate findings for resolution  Communicating with other business units Desirable skills: Highly skilled in Outlook, Excel and Word  Excellent Communication Skills  Great attention to detail  Previous data analyst experience
